entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
